name: JUMPEROG
description:
3D Frog Survival game

Frog Survival contain beautiful environment which include green grass, rocky terrain , cool Fog and rocks. Background sounds and music matches the environment. The  game is very Fun to play and challenging.  The Player is Frog character  with smooth control and sound effects

Game Goal

Goal is to catch as many flies by Frog and avoid from angry bird that wants to eat the Frog. Collectable Flies are scattered in whole environment.

Controls

Controls of Frog Survival game is UP , Down, Left and Right Arrow keys OR you can also use the W(UP) S(Down) A(Left) D(Right) keys.

Specialty

  • Smooth Controls
  • Beautiful Environment
  • Awesome Effects
  • Challenging Enemy
  • Collectable Flies
